Provided day-to-day technical support for over 190 staff across a level 5 hospital and 18 remote clinics, ensuring smooth IT operations and user satisfaction. Led hardware/software upgrades, network setup, and installation of devices including routers, switches, VoIP, IP cameras, and firewalls. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align IT with organizational goals and supported ICT procurement, vendor management, and compliance. Successfully managed IT project timelines and budgets, contributing to efficient system performance and timely product rollouts.

Monitored project milestones and regularly reported progress to senior management, ensuring accountability and visibility throughout the project lifecycle. Conducted training sessions for data entry clerks, mobilizers, and spray operators on proper use of data collection tools.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of action and crime genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring barber, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the DevOps Space.
